title: Kingdom Come Deliverance (RUS|ENG|MULTI9) [RePack] by xatab
description:
System requirements:
Operating system: Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 (64-bit versions) 
Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 3.7 GHz or equivalent 
RAM: 8 GB 
Video: GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7850; 
Free space on the hard disk: 31.7 GB (41.3 GB-HD)


DESCRIPTION: 
Kingdom Come: Deliverance is an exciting RPG with an open world that takes you to an epic adventure in the Holy Roman Empire. Take revenge for the death of your parents, fighting with invasion forces, carry out quests, change the world with your decisions. 
You are Henry the son of a blacksmith. Once in the whirlpool of the events of the Civil War, you helplessly watch the invaders storm your village and carve your friends and family. By miraculously avoiding a cruel fate, you will raise your sword for retribution. Take revenge for the death of your parents and help drive away the invaders! 

FEATURES: 
- The release is taken from CODEX 
- Cut out voice acting except English / Nothing is recoded 
- Game archives are not opened 
- Game version v 1.4.1
- 
HD Texture and Audio Pack 
- The ability to not download HD textures (Data-HD.bin) 
- Installation time 20 minutes without HD textures (Depends on the computer) 
- Time installs 25 minutes with HD textures (Depends on the computer) 
- To install the game with HD textures run from setup-HD.exe 
- To install the game without HD textures, run setup.exe 
- Change the language in the settings menu of the game 

Installation notes:
-Burn of mount the iso
-Install
-Play
